page.title: 10HEALTH
page.content: The health centre in Sturminster was built in June 1982.It took a year to build.It offers help to the elderly, pregnant ladies,school children and the physically and mentally handicapped.It provides family planning,psychology,diet classes and medicals for school children.Rubella and B.C.G. immunisation covers all Dorset schools.There are also child welfare consultants,paediatricians physio & occupational therapy, audiology & audiometry,which are hearing tests,and eye tests.The main problems dealt with are chiropody and child immunisation,1200 school pupils are treated each year.They have a health visitor,secretary,chiropodist and a caretaker. DOCTORS,Dr Boulton and Dr John Snowden DENTISTS, L.J. Shafford. NEAREST HOSPITAL .....BLANDFORD
